com.tinfoil.sms.crypto

Class ExchangeKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinfoil.sms.crypto.ExchangeKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ExchangeKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class that creates a thread to manage a user's exchange of keys with contacts. It will go through each contact that the user wishes to exchange keys with and queue a key exchange message. This thread only handles the first phase of the key exchange. The second phase is handled in the MessagerReceiver.

      • startThread

        public void startThread(Activity activity,
               java.lang.String trusted,
               java.lang.String untrusted)
        Used to setup the a key exchange for a single contact or to untrust a single contact.
        Parameters:
        trusted - The number of the contact to send a key exchange to, do not sent a key exchange if null
        untrusted - The number of the contact to un-trust, no contact is untrusted.
